question: The value of 'A' in the equation <katex>$\lambda_{m}=\lambda_{m}^{\circ}-A\sqrt{C}$</katex> is same for the pair: [cite: 340]
explanation: The constant 'A' depends on the type of electrolyte (charge numbers of cation and anion). NaCl (1:1) and KBr (1:1) are the same type, so they have the same 'A' value. [cite: 342, 343]
